nodes.text: The Shoals was the name of a Quarren settlement in Lamaredd.

Around five hundred years before the Battle of Naboo, a number of Quarren, Mon Calamari, and aliens from other amphibious species were attracted to settle in Bartyn's Landing, a coastal town in Lamaredd, and work as fishermen. The conditions of the deal were worse than expected, as the owner of Bartyn's Landing, Hugo Bartyn, deceived and openly enslaved the immigrants. Violence between species was common, as the city was crowded and Quarrens and Mon Calamari never got along at all.

A big number of Quarrens approached Bartyn and asked him to allow them to settle in their own town of fishermen, still working for him. Bartyn answered by leasing them some land in the other side of the bay. The Quarrens then created their town, known as the Shoals.
